# color struct

> **来源**: https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/verse-api/versedotorg/colors/color
> **爬取时间**: 2025-12-27T01:18:26.191732

---

Represents colors as RGB triples in the ACES 2065-1 color space.
Component values are linear (i.e. `*gamma* = 1.0`).

|  |  |
| --- | --- |
| Verse `using` statement | `using { /Verse.org/Colors }` |

## Members

This struct has data members, but no functions.

### Data

| Data Member Name | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| `R` | `float` | Red component of this `color`. |
| `G` | `float` | Green component of this `color`. |
| `B` | `float` | Blue component of this `color`. |
